publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3778 Mr Andy Kerr: The Draft Civic Government (Scotland) Act 1982 (Licensing of Skin Piercing and Tattooing) Order 2006â€”That the Health Committee recommends that the draft Civic Government (Scotland) Act 1982 (Licensing of Skin Piercing and Tattooing) Order 2006 be approved.
